  • simnibs.simulation.tms_coil →

simnibs.simulation.tms_dadt¶

simnibs.simulation.tms_dadt(mesh, cond, dAdt, solver_options=None)¶

Simulates a TMS electric potential from a dA/dt field

Parameters:

  • mesh (simnibs.msh.mesh_io.Msh) – Mesh file with geometry information

  • cond (simnibs.msh.mesh_io.ElementData) – An ElementData field with conductivity information

  • dAdt (simnibs.msh.mesh_io.NodeData or simnibs.msh.mesh_io.ElementData) – dAdt information

Returns:

v – NodeData instance with potential at the nodes

Return type:

simnibs.msh.mesh_io.NodeData
